title: "A future-facing minister, a young inventor and a shared vision: An AI tutor for every student"
excerpt: "If everything goes according to plan, every student in the United Arab Emirates’ school system will have a personal AI tutor – that fits in their pockets. It’s a story that involves an element of coincidence, a forward-looking education minister and a tech team led by a chief executive officer who still lives at home with his parents."
